column1:
Overall Negative Sentiment Percentages per Aspect Over the Years

Cleanliness: 22.6% in 2021 and 29.2% in 2022
Amenities: 12.2% in 2021 and 21.8% in 2022
Location: 2.7% in 2021 and 0% in 2022
Services: 28.7% in 2021 and 28.9% in 2022
General: 26.1% in 2021 and 29.1% in 2022
Value: 29.7% in 2021 and 24.4% in 2022

Suggestions to Improve: 
Cleanliness: Improve the cleanliness of the location in order to reduce the negative sentiment percentage.
Amenities: Increase the number of amenities offered at the location in order to reduce the negative sentiment percentage.
Location: Improve the location of the location or offer additional transportation options to and from the location in order to reduce the negative sentiment percentage.
Services: Improve the quality of services offered at the location in order to reduce the negative sentiment percentage.
General: Increase customer satisfaction in order to reduce the negative sentiment percentage.
Value: Offer more value for customers in order to reduce the negative sentiment percentage.
